item.title: Top 10 Tableau Alternatives to Explore in 2024
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: Introduction While Tableau remains a popular choice for data visualization, its dominance is waning. The increasing importance of data analysis across industries has fueled the demand for versatile tools, leading to a surge in Tableau alternatives. These alternatives cater to various needs, whether you prioritize affordability, extensive customization, or specialized functionalities. A range of options […]
item.content:encoded:

The post Top 10 Tableau Alternatives to Explore in 2024 appeared first on Analytics Vidhya.

item.title: How to Improve Dataset Selection with ChatGPT?
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: Introduction Right choice of appropriate datasets is essential in today’s data-driven environment to facilitate well-informed decision-making and uncover insightful information. It might be intimidating to navigate the enormous amount of data that is available, though. This article examines how the dataset selection process can be streamlined by using ChatGPT. ChatGPT can help you with everything […]

item.title: 10 Ways to Use AI in Data Analytics
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: Introduction Incorporating Artificial Intelligence (AI) into Data Analytics has become a revolutionary force in the era of abundant data. It is transforming how businesses get insights from their data reservoirs. Artificial Intelligence (AI) enhances conventional analytics techniques by leveraging machine learning and natural language processing to achieve previously unheard-of efficiency, accuracy, and creativity. This article delves into artificial […]
item.content:encoded:
Introduction Incorporating Artificial Intelligence (AI) into Data Analytics has become a revolutionary force in the era of abundant data. It is transforming how businesses get insights from their data reservoirs. Artificial Intelligence (AI) enhances conventional analytics techniques by leveraging machine learning and natural language processing to achieve previously unheard-of efficiency, accuracy, and creativity. This article delves into artificial […]

item.title: How Data Efficient GANs Generate Images of Cats and Dogs?
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: Introduction Generative adversarial networks are a popular framework for Image generation. In this article we’ll train Data-efficient GANs with Adaptive Discriminator Augmentation that addresses the challenge of limited training data. Adaptive Discriminator Augmentation dynamically adjusts data augmentation during GAN training, preventing discriminator overfitting and enhancing model generalization. By employing invertible augmentation techniques and probabilistic application, […]
item.content:encoded:
Introduction Generative adversarial networks are a popular framework for Image generation. In this article we’ll train Data-efficient GANs with Adaptive Discriminator Augmentation that addresses the challenge of limited training data. Adaptive Discriminator Augmentation dynamically adjusts data augmentation during GAN training, preventing discriminator overfitting and enhancing model generalization. By employing invertible augmentation techniques and probabilistic application, […]

The post How Data Efficient GANs Generate Images of Cats and Dogs? appeared first on Analytics Vidhya.
